name: Glorkian Warrior: The Trials Of Glork
description: A comic-styled mashup of Galaga-style shoot-em-up, simple platforming action, and Saturday morning cartoon. In collaboration with Eisner-award-winning cartoonist James Kochalka!
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows XP Процессор: 1 Ghz CPU Оперативная память: 500 MB ОЗУ Место на диске: 80 MB

reviews.review_text: Greatest Galaga clone ever. It has cool arcade gameplay, funny characters, nice visuals and vintage sounds. And funny comic strip too. Only THREE buttons to punch! And it also has HIDDEN cards.

Have you ever wanted to save the galaxy from the Evil Space Nacho? Yes? Well, then this isn't the game for you, sorry. You might want to try real life if you want that.   So, why do I recommend this game? I have a simple reason: THE EMOTES ARE GLORKTASTIC!  ;-; Emotes don't work here...   And if that doesn't convince you (which I highly doubt), remember that Glork and his best friend Super Backpack will tell you bad jokes until your brain explodes! Or until you quit.

Pixeljam turns into chef-d'oeuvre whatever genre they are having a go at. This is no exception : here is the Galaga clone to end all Galaga clones! It features awesome art, incredible sound design, a cheery and absurd atmosphere, and even great characters!  The gameplay is as tight as in old coin-op shooters, and even if you aren't highscore chasing (which you should), there is plenty of wacky unlocks to pursue. Every second you play go toward that progress, which is always a nice touch of appreciation to the player from the designer. I played to no end the phone version. This PC port retains the same very tight control scheme (you are autofiring and only controlling movements) that feels perfectly at home here too. The only thing missing are friends or even global leaderboards, but that's okay 'cause I don't have friends and I am bad at games.  [Edit : actually there are leaderboards, but I fail to see them sometimes @_@]  Wonderful.

This is an Excellent Arcade Game that will bring you tens of entertainment hours at monetary low-cost. I absolutely love Concept Art & the phrases make me laugh a lot. Has better Campaign that 'Call of Duty'. So guys, KBYTERCEROX APPROVES this game.
I like the silly art direction, but inconsistent design choices and enemy behaviour make this a bad game.
It's instant fun. One of those games, that you can play, when you have nothing to play. Charming visuals and sounds, awesome, poslihed gameplay. Can only recommend this one.
Ugly graphics that lack detail. Boring, unoriginal gameplay. Like a game from thirty years ago.
Galaga, but with Kochalka Quality approval
I nice cartoony take on galaxians

This game is beyond fantastic! Charm for Days! The Gameplay is spot on, the art style is unique and beautiful, and the dialog in the speech bubbles is outright hilarious! And the sound effects? So cool! I remember the Arcade days during the 80s, new attract sounds coming out of amazing machines, drawing me to deposit my quarters. Glorkian Warrior absolutely nails that feeling and takes me back!  Get this amazing game!

I bought this game on sale for $1 and it is well worth that price. I've put at least 3 hours into it and enjoyed all three of them. It's a fairly simple Space Invaders type game but there's a charm to the art and humor that keeps me entertained. I imagine I'll tire of this after 5-10 hours but that's more than worth $1!
